content.text: A piece of string is cut into three pieces in the ratio $2 : 4 : 7$. The longest piece is 40 cm longer than the shortest piece. Find the original length of the piece of string.
content.text_latex: A piece of string is cut into three pieces in the ratio $2 : 4 : 7$. The longest piece is 40 cm longer than the shortest piece. Find the original length of the piece of string.
